org.deeplearning4j.spark.impl.evaluation

Class EvaluationRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.spark.impl.evaluation.EvaluationRunner

  • public class EvaluationRunner
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton evaluation hrunner class for performing evaluation on Spark. Allows fewer evaluation networks (and hence memory/cache thrashing) than one network per spark thread

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Evaluate the data using the specified evaluations

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static EvaluationRunner getInstance()

      • execute

        public java.util.concurrent.Future<IEvaluation[]> execute(IEvaluation[] evals,
                                                          int evalWorkers,
                                                          int evalBatchSize,
                                                          java.util.Iterator<DataSet> ds,
                                                          java.util.Iterator<MultiDataSet> mds,
                                                          boolean isCG,
                                                          org.apache.spark.broadcast.Broadcast<java.lang.String> json,
                                                          org.apache.spark.broadcast.Broadcast<INDArray> params)
        Evaluate the data using the specified evaluations
        Parameters:
        evals - Evaluations to perform
        evalWorkers - Number of concurrent workers
        evalBatchSize - Evaluation batch size to use
        ds - DataSet iterator
        mds - MultiDataSet iterator
        isCG - True if ComputationGraph, false otherwise
        json - JSON for the network
        params - Parameters for the network
        Returns:
        Future for the results
